ML_TI_DOC.TI_TEXT: Услуги по опушване с цел дезинфекция

ML_TI_DOC.TI_CY: Dik li kienet ir-Repubblika Jugoslava tal-Maċedonja

ML_AA_NAMES.AA_NAME: Centre for development of the South-East planning region

ORGANISATION.OFFICIALNAME: Centre for development of the South-East planning region

TITLE_CONTRACT.P: Supply of service for aerial application of adult mosquitoes elimination agent over the area of ten municipalities across the South-East planning region including Bogdanci, Bosilovo, Valandovo, Vasilevo, Gevgelija, Dojran, Konche, Novo Selo, Radovish and Strumica.

LOCATION.P: Across the territory of ten Municipalities of Bogdanci, Bosilovo, Valandovo, Vasilevo, Gevgelija, Dojran, Konche, Novo Selo, Radovish and Strumica.

SHORT_CONTRACT_DESCRIPTION.P: Supply of service for aerial spraying for elimination of adult mosquitoes (adulticide aerosol fumigation) over the area of the municipalities across the South-East planning region as follows:
— Municipality of Bogdanci with a surface of 375ha, 2 treatments,
— Municipality of Bosilovo with a surface of 423ha, 2 treatments,
— Municipality of Valandovo with a surface of 1000ha, 2 treatments,
— Municipality of Vasilevo with a surface of 233 ha, 2 treatments,
— Municipality of Gevgelija with a surface of 1000ha, 2 treatments,
— Municipality of Dojran, with a surface of 300ha, 2 treatments,
— Municipality of Konche with a surface of 160ha, 2 treatments,
— Municipality of Novo Selo, with a surface of 250ha, 2 treatments,
— Municipality of Radovish, with a surface of 1000ha, 2 treatments,

— Municipality of Strumica with a surface of 1000ha, 2 treatments with a total area for one treatment of 5 741ha, second treatment of area of 5741ha or a total area to be treated with the first and second spraying adding up to 11482ha.

TOTAL_QUANTITY_OR_SCOPE.P: Supply of service for aerial spraying for elimination of adult mosquitoes (adulticide aerosol fumigation) over the area of the municipalities across the South-East planning region as follows:
— Municipality of Bogdanci with a surface of 375ha, 2 treatments,
— Municipality of Bosilovo with a surface of 423ha, 2 treatments,
— Municipality of Valandovo with a surface of 1000ha, 2 treatments,
— Municipality of Vasilevo with a surface of 233 ha, 2 treatments,
— Municipality of Gevgelija with a surface of 1000ha, 2 treatments,
— Municipality of Dojran, with a surface of 300ha, 2 treatments,
— Municipality of Konche with a surface of 160ha, 2 treatments,
— Municipality of Novo Selo, with a surface of 250ha, 2 treatments,
— Municipality of Radovish, with a surface of 1000ha, 2 treatments,

— Municipality of Strumica with a surface of 1000ha, 2 treatments with a total area for one treatment of 5 741ha, second treatment of area of 5741ha or a total area to be treated with the first and second spraying adding up to 11482ha.

ECONOMIC_OPERATORS_PERSONAL_SITUATION.P: As proof of their personal standing, the economic operators shall submit the following documents.

— Statement of the economic operator that in the last 5 years no enforceable judgment has been pronounced against them for participation in a criminal organization, corruption, fraud or money laundering,
— Document issued by a competent authority to confirm that no insolvency procedure has been initiated,
— Document issued by a competent authority to confirm that no liquidation procedure has been initiated,
— Certificate of paid taxes, contributions and other public duties issued by a competent authority in the country where the economic operator is registered,

— Certificate from the Register of Penalty notices for committed criminal offences by legal entities confirming that no secondary penalty has been imposed in the form of ban on participation in public procurement procedures, public contracts and contracts for public-private partnership award procedure,

— Certificate from the Register of Penalty notices for committed criminal offences by legal entities confirming that no secondary sanction has been imposed such as temporary or permanent ban on performing certain business activity,

— Certificate to confirm that no misdemeanour sanction — ban on practising a certain profession, carrying out a business activity or performing duties has been imposed by virtue of an enforceable judgment, i.e. a temporary ban on performing certain business activity.

T_CAPACITY_INFORMATION.P: Documents required to prove the technical or professional capability of the economic operator:

Certificate of work for performing specialized services with an aircraft which, among other things, regulates the basic condition for performing this type of activity i.e. the disposal of chemicals and water from an aircraft (Elimination of insects in agriculture, Elimination of animal pests), issued by the Civil Aviation Agency of the Republic of Macedonia pursuant to the Law on Aviation of the Republic of Macedonia (Official Journal of the Republic of Macedonia Nº 14/06 24/07 103/08 67/10 118/10 24/12 80/12 155/12 42/14 95/15 and 152/15), as well as in accordance with the stipulated provisions of the Rulebook on the Manner of performing specialized services with an Aircraft and the special requirements regarding aircraft, equipment and other special requirements for safe and proper operation (Official Journal of the Republic of Macedonia Nº 159/07 and 122/13) — List of employed professionals with a description of their qualifications for the execution of the subject matter of this contract annexed with (Forms M1 / M2) — Reference list of services rendered in the last 3 years indicating details in respect of the subject of the contracts, the amount and the date of the contracts and the contracting authorities for which the services were rendered, accompanied by copies of contracts and certificates for quality service performance issued by the contracting authority.

T_CAPACITY_MIN_LEVEL.P: Minimum criteria for assessment of the technical and professional capability of the economic operator:
— Proof of competence of the economic operator for performing this type of activity,
— aerial application of mosquito elimination agent issued by a competent authority in the Republic of Macedonia,
— to have at least 3 employees for the execution of the subject purchase
— to have completed at least 3 contracts for aerial application of mosquito elimination agent (aerosol adulticide fumigation) in the last 3 years on the territory of the Republic of Macedonia.

EXECUTION_SERVICE_RESERVED_PARTICULAR_PR.P: Document stating the registered activity (Form DRD) as evidence that the economic operator is registered as a natural or legal person for performing the activity related to the subject matter of the public procurement contract or evidence that it belongs to a relevant professional association in accordance with the regulations of the country where registered.

USE_ELECTRONIC_AUCTION.P: The auction will be scheduled after the evaluation of bids.

PLACE_NOT_STRUCTURED.P: Centre for development of the South-East Planning Region, str. Boro Dzoni Nº 10, 2400 Strumica

EXISTENCE_AUTHORISED_PERSONS.P: The opening of tenders will be online on the System of PPB.

CONTACT_DATA_WITHOUT_RESPONSIBLE_NAME.ADDRESS: Economic Chamber of Macedonia st. Dimitrie Chupovski, 13 1000 Skopje

LODGING_OF_APPEALS_PRECISION.P: 8 days after the adoption of Decision for selection.
